title: The Immortals Fenyx Rising Digital Issue Is Now Live
summary:
Digital subscribers of Game Informer can now read our cover story on Ubisoft's next open-world adventure, Immortals Fenyx Rising.
Following today's cover reveal, our digital issue is now live to subscribers on web browsers, iPad/iPhone, and Android devices.
You can download the apps to view the issue by following this link.
The issue launches later this week on our third-party subscription apps including Kindle and Nook.
For more on Immortals Fenyx Rising, click the banner below to check out our coverage hub.
paragraphs: Digital subscribers of Game Informer can now read our cover story on Ubisoft's next open-world adventure, Immortals Fenyx Rising. Following today's cover reveal, our digital issue is now live to subscribers on web browsers, iPad/iPhone, and Android devices. Individual issues will be available for purchase later today. You can download the apps to view the issue by following this link. All of these digital options are included in a standard subscription.
The issue launches later this week on our third-party subscription apps including Kindle and Nook.
Not a digital subscriber yet? Convert your existing print subscription here or start a new subscription here.
For more on Immortals Fenyx Rising, click the banner below to check out our coverage hub. We’ll be updating it regularly in the lead up to launch, so be sure to stop by and see what’s new.
authors: Brian Has Written About Video Games For Over A Decade Across Multiple Publications. When He'S Not Writing Or Gaming
Or Hopelessly Rooting For A Baltimore Or D.C. Sports Team.
